attributes.action: Prevent politicians from attempting to change the will of the people in Brexit.
attributes.background:
Brexit was the result of a democratic vote of the people of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland. There was a clear gap in the votes. 

This vote should be upheld and any attempt by politicians to change this should result in termination of their position.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions, and decisions on whether to resign are a matter for individual MPs. 

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
